scripts.say: All right, we should be safe here. Just gotta deal with the ones that're coming after us!
Heads up: more Sirens approaching from the southeast. Most of the ones we alerted have stopped moving, so we can take care of them easy peasy.
Man, these Eagle Union guys pack some amazing firepower for not even using Siren tech...
Is it because of the Commander's leadership skills? Is the Commander *that* big-brained? I've gotta look into this...
I could've sworn I just heard someone talking about me...
Oh, um, ahaha! Just thinking out loud!
